intervention_catalogue.name: Stepping Stones
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Stepping Stones can be used to support PPs to hold discussions and to complete exercises which seek to support the individual to lead an offence-free life. The material can be used in a flexible way and tailored to meet the needs of each participant.
intervention_catalogue.long_description:
A resource which offers offender managers practical exercises to use in supervision with people on licence or a community order. The primary focus is on strengthening and developing the protective factors identified in the Risk of Serious Harm (RoSH) guidance 2021 to support rehabilitation and reduce re-offending: 

Strengths (internal protective factors) 

Resources (external protective factors)

Capacity and motivation
